Version information

Builds on Semaphore run on Ubuntu 12.04 Precise LTS. The following Ruby versions are available via rbenv:

  • 2.0.0-p247
  • 1.9.3-p448
  • 1.9.2-p320
  • ree-1.8.7-2012.02
  • JRuby 1.7.4
  • Bundler 1.3.5

System packages installed by default include:

Name Version
chromedriver 28.0.1500
Elasticsearch 0.90.2
Firefox 22.0
libqtwebkit4 2.2.1
imagemagick 6.6.9.7
Java (openjdk) 7u21-2.3.9
Linux kernel 3.2.0-38
memcached 1.4.13
MongoDB 2.2.2
MySQL 5.5.31
Node.js 0.10.12
PhantomJS 1.9.1
PostgreSQL 9.1.9
Redis 2.6.14
Sphinx 2.0.4
sqlite 3.7.9
wkhtmltopdf 0.9.6

Note: this is a partial list. You can upgrade or add additional packages for your builds with apt-get – either from Ubuntu’s official distribution channels or third-party PPAs.

Troubleshooting

  • Build fails with “Unknown database ‘xyz_test’” or "FATAL: database “xyx_test” does not exist"
  • “fatal: Could not parse object” during bundle install
  • file not found: db:create (ArgumentError)”
  • Tests or setup failed with “Real HTTP connections are disabled.”
  • Failed build reported as passed
  • My tests / integration specs / scenarios fail on Semaphore but pass locally
  • Selenium tests are unable to obtain connection to Firefox
  • I’m having issues with capybara-webkit
  • My build fails if I have pending Cucumber scenarios
  • My build takes longer than an hour
  • My Sphinx tests fail
  • I’m having problems with git submodules
